name: KOORB - ERP Consultants NZ
overview:
Koorb Consulting offers implementation and support for Microsoft Dynamics AX, Dynamics CRM and Microsoft Business Intelligence (BI) Solutions.

Koorb’s 40 certified consultants has extensive experience in working with Dynamics AX the company is responsible for implementing over 60% of all Dynamics AX sites in New Zealand. Koorb Consulting works with some of the leading Microsoft Dynamics AX ISV’s and believes in the importance of partnership and maintaining good relations. It is fully committed to the programs they specialize in and support over 1600 users in New Zealand, Australia, the UK as well as other countries.

Microsoft Dynamics AX is a leader in Enterprise Resource Planning and allows businesses to manage their business across multiple locations, currencies and countries. With Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 businesses can achieve fast time to value, grow global solutions, work smart and fast, gain competitive edges, lower their total cost of ownership, leverage the power of the Microsoft Platform and more. In 2011 Koorb Consulting purchased the Dynamics AX and CRM practice of Enabling Technologies in the South Island to further extend their capabilities and expand their ability to help customers.
